links.title: Tesla Short Sellers Lose A Further $500 Million
links.description: Investors betting against Elon Musk and Tesla took another beating last week. For the third consecutive week, Tesla was the worst-performing stock for short sellers, with mark-to-market weekly losses of $520 million, taking year-to-date losses to $4.7 billion, according to financial analytics firm S3 Partners.
